channel.title: Falcon on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Falcon on Machine Learning

item.title: Learning Falcon
item.description: A great 5-video tutorial: 35minutes on YouTube (6 tomatoes / 2.5 hours for non-stop studing by coding). Author’s Github (py2), My Github (py3). Differences in my Github code: py3, not py2 using on_put() to test validity of input json from client using on_delete() to test params (just to test, should NOT be used in real-world) using another route /test2?x=1&y=3 to test params Usage in Nix: pip3 install falcon gunicorn gunicorn app:api # in the folder of app.
